interface.description: Actuator controlling window blinds (or similar equipment).

field.name: Blinds
field.description: Momentary position of blinds, in percent. Unit must be `%`.

parameter.name: Blinds
parameter.description: Desired state of the blinds. 0 = No blinds, 100 = Blinds covering entire window. The device must support control parameter requests of both double and int types.
